title: MythicMobs如何让怪物永久隐身
author: dddfly
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Crow__
replies.txt_content:
服务器: 1.88 PaperSpigot
MythicMobs版本: 2.1
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  Skills:
  - potion{type=INVISIBILITY;duration=1000000;level=5} @self ~onSpawn
  (当怪物出生时给予怪物 隐身V 1000000ticks)
  - potion{type=INVISIBILITY;duration=100000;level=5} @self ~onTimer:100
  (每过五秒给予怪物 隐身V 1000000ticks 仅用作延长隐身时间)
